```{r}
library(tidyverse)
scope.data = readLines("logs/scope.log")
scope.data = scope.data[str_starts(scope.data,'[')]
```


### splicing

```{r}
splicing.nums = c()

for(data in scope.data){
  if(str_detect(data, "SCOPE begin!")){
    splicing.nums = append(splicing.nums, 0)
  }
  if(str_detect(data, "splicing iteration")){
    splicing.nums[length(splicing.nums)] = splicing.nums[length(splicing.nums)] + 1
  }
}
```
